original: Passaddhakāyassa, ānanda, na cetanā karaṇīyā ‘kintāhaṁ sukhaṁ vediyeyyan’ti.
analyzed: passaddha kāyassa ānanda na cetanā karaṇīyā kintā aham sukham
corrected: passaddha kāyassa ānanda na cetanā karaṇīyā kintā aham sukham vediyeyyan ti

original: Dhammatā esā, ānanda, yaṁ passaddhakāyo sukhaṁ vediyeyya.
analyzed: dhamma tā esā ānanda yam passaddha kāyaḥ sukham
corrected: dhammatā esā ānanda yaṁ passaddha kāyo sukhaṁ vediyeyya

original: bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gilitabaḷiso mārassa, abhedi baḷisaṁ, paribhedi baḷisaṁ, na
analyzed: bhikkhave bhikkhu na gilita baḷisaḥ mārassa na
corrected: bhikkhave bhikkhu na gilita baḷisaḥ mārassa abhedi baḷisaṁ paribhedi baḷisaṁ na

original: “Sukiccaṁ ceva puññānī”ti vāsanā.
analyzed: su kiccam ca iva puññāni iti vāsanā
corrected: su kiccam ca eva iva puññāni iti vāsanā

original: tena teneva niddisitabbaṁ, tassā vitthāro dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatāni.
analyzed: tena tena iva vitthāraḥ dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhi gatāni
corrected: tena tena eva niddisitabbaṁ tassā vitthāro dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhi gatāni

original: Lābho alābho, yaso ayaso, nindā pasaṁsā, sukhaṁ dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: lābhaḥ a lābhaḥ yasaḥ a yasaḥ nindā pasasā sukham
corrected: lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṁsā sukhaṁ dukkhaṁ

original: “Laddhāna mānusattaṁ dve, kiccaṁ akiccameva cā”ti dve gāthā.
analyzed: dve kiccam akiccam eva ca ati dve gāthā
corrected: Laddhāna mānusattaṁ dve kiccaṁ akiccaṁ eva ca iti dve gāthā

original: paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ anubuddhaṁ paṭividdhaṁ.
analyzed: paṭipadā ariya saccam anubuddham
corrected: paṭipadā ariya saccam anubuddham paṭividdham

original: Katamāni tīṇi, anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ aññindriyaṁ aññātāvindriyaṁ.
analyzed: katamāni tīṇi aññindriyam aññātāvindriya
corrected: katamāni tīṇi anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ aññindriyaṁ aññātāvindriyaṁ

original: yathākammūpage satte pajānātīti visajjanīyaṁ.
analyzed: yathākammūpage satte pajānāti iti
corrected: yathākammūpage satte pajānāti iti visajjanīyaṁ

original: Saṁvaṭṭamāne sudāhaṁ, bhikkhave, kappe ābhassarūpago homi.
analyzed: bhikkhave kappe ābhassa rūpago homi
corrected: Saṁvaṭṭamāne sudāhaṁ bhikkhave kappe ābhassa rūpago homi

original: Yenāhaṁ etarahi evaṁmahiddhiko evaṁmahānubhāvo’ti.
analyzed: yena aham etarahi evam ahiddhikaḥ evam ahā anubhāvaḥ iti
corrected: yena aham etarahi evam mahiddhiko evam mahā anubhāvo iti

original: Alobho kusalamūlaṁ, adoso kusalamūlaṁ, amoho kusalamūlaṁ.
analyzed: a lobhaḥ kusala mūla a dosaḥ kusala mūla a mohaḥ kusala mūla
corrected: alobho kusala mūlaṁ adoso kusala mūlaṁ amoho kusala mūlaṁ

original: “Vijjā, bhikkhave, pubbaṅgamā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā anudeva hirī ottappañcā”ti.
analyzed: vijjā bhikkhave pubbaṅgamā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā hirī
corrected: vijjā bhikkhave pubbaṅgamā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā anudeva hirī ottappañcā ti

original: Kāyasucaritaṁ vacīsucaritaṁ manosucaritanti.
analyzed: kāya su caritam vacī su caritam
corrected: kāya su caritam vacī su caritam mano su caritam ti

original: Kāyaduccaritaṁ vacīduccaritaṁ manoduccaritanti.
analyzed: kāya duccaritam vacī duccaritam
corrected: kāya duccaritam vacī duccaritam mano duccaritam ti

original: “sabbapāpassa akaraṇan”ti, idaṁ paṭikkhittaṁ, yaṁ āha—
analyzed: sabba pāpassa akaraṇanti idam yam āha
corrected: sabba pāpassa akaraṇanti idam paṭikkhittam yam āha

original: “Kāyasamācārampāhaṁ, devānaminda, duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi asevitabbampi.
analyzed: devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi a sevitabbampi
corrected: Kāyasamācārampahaṁ devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi a sevitabbampi

original: Lokiyaṁ suttaṁ sattādhiṭṭhānaṁ ekūnavīsatiyā puggalehi niddisitabbaṁ.
analyzed: lokiyam suttam satta adhiṭṭhānam ekūnavīsatiyā puggalehi
corrected: lokiyam suttam satta adhiṭṭhānam ekūnavīsatiyā puggalehi niddisitabbam

original: Akusalaṁ saṅkilesabhāgiyena suttena niddisitabbaṁ.
analyzed: akusalam saṅkilesa bhāgiyena suttena
corrected: akusalam saṅkilesa bhāgiyena suttena niddisitabbam

original: Kusalañca akusalañca tadubhayena niddisitabbaṁ.
analyzed: kusalam ca akusalam ca tat ubhayena
corrected: kusalam ca akusalam ca tat ubhayena niddisitabbam

original: Anuññātaṁ bhagavato anuññātāya niddisitabbaṁ, taṁ pañcavidhaṁ saṁvaro pahānaṁ bhāvanā
analyzed: anuññātam bhagavataḥ anuññātāya tam pañcavidham pahānam bhāvanā
corrected: anuññātam bhagavato anuññātāya niddisitabbam tam pañcavidham samvaro pahānam bhāvanā
